00029 /* Configuration defines */
00030 
00036 #define CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM    1
00037 
00040 #define CONF_WITH_TRANSACTIONS  1
00041 
00046 #define CONF_WITH_TESTCMDS      1
00047 
00050 #define CONF_WITH_DELETECMD     1
00051 
00054 #define CONF_WITH_CREATECMD     1
00055 
00061 #define CONF_WITH_PINAUTH       1
00062 
00067 #define CONF_WITH_PINCMDS       1
00068 
00074 #define CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH       1
00075 
00081 #define CONF_WITH_KEYCMDS       1
00082 
00085 #define CONF_WITH_I2CEEPROM     1
00086 
00092 #define CONF_WITH_DECRYPT       1
00093 
00098 #define CONF_WITH_LOGGING       1
00099 
00105 #define CONF_WITH_RETCODEMGR    0
00106 
00111 #define CONF_WITH_FUNNY         0
00112 
00118 #define CONF_WITH_TRNG          0
00119 
00126 #define CONF_WITH_CRYPT_ALGO    0   /* TEA */
00127 //#define CONF_WITH_CRYPT_ALGO  1   /* Skipjack */
00128 //#define CONF_WITH_CRYPT_ALGO  2   /* NEWDES-SK */
00129 
00130 /* Verify dependencies */
00131 
00132 /* CONF_WITH_PINAUTH is required for CONF_WITH_PINCMDS */
00133 #if (CONF_WITH_PINCMDS==1) && (CONF_WITH_PINAUTH!=1)
00134 #undef CONF_WITH_PINAUTH
00135 #define CONF_WITH_PINAUTH       1
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 /* CONF_WITH_PINAUTH is required for CONF_WITH_PINCMDS */
00139 #if (CONF_WITH_PINCMDS==1) && (CONF_WITH_PINAUTH!=1)
00140 #undef CONF_WITH_PINAUTH
00141 #define CONF_WITH_PINAUTH       1
00142 #endif
00143 
00144 /* If we do not have a file system, we dom't need CREATE and DELETE */
00145 #if (CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM!=1) && (CONF_WITH_DELETECMD==1)
00146 #undef CONF_WITH_DELETECMD
00147 #define CONF_WITH_DELETECMD     0
00148 #endif
00149 #if (CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM!=1) && (CONF_WITH_CREATECMD==1)
00150 #undef CONF_WITH_CREATECMD
00151 #define CONF_WITH_CREATECMD     0
00152 #endif
00153 
00154 /* CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH is required for CONF_WITH_KEYCMDS */
00155 #if (CONF_WITH_KEYCMDS==1) && (CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH!=1)
00156 #undef CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH
00157 #define CONF_WITH_KEYAUTH       1
00158 #endif
00159 
00160 /* EEPROM addresses */
00161 
00169 #define CARD_STATE_ADDR     0x0000
00170 
00172 #define ATR_LEN_ADDR        (CARD_STATE_ADDR+1)
00174 #define ATR_MAXLEN          28
00176 #define ATR_ADDR            (ATR_LEN_ADDR+1)
00177 
00179 #define SERNUM_ADDR         (ATR_ADDR+ATR_MAXLEN)
00181 #define SERNUM_LEN          8
00182 
00184 #define RAND_STATE_ADDR     (SERNUM_ADDR+SERNUM_LEN)
00186 #define RAND_STATE_LEN      8+8+16
00187 
00189 #define TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR  (RAND_STATE_ADDR+RAND_STATE_LEN)
00191 #define TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR   (TRANSAC_STATE_ADDR+1)
00193 #define TRANSAC_DATA_LEN    19  /* Currently 2B addr, 1B len, 16B data */
00194 
00196 #define ADM_KEY_LEN         16
00198 #define INT_KEY_LEN         16
00200 #define PIN_LEN             8
00202 #define PUK_LEN             8
00203 
00204 #if CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM==1
00206 #define DATA_END_1          (TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR+TRANSAC_DATA_LEN)
00207 #else /* CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM!=1 */
00209 #define ADM_KEY_ADDR        (TRANSAC_DATA_ADDR+TRANSAC_DATA_LEN)
00211 #define ADM_RETCNTR_ADDR    (ADM_KEY_ADDR+ADM_KEY_LEN)
00212 
00214 #define INT_KEY_ADDR        (ADM_RETCNTR_ADDR+1)
00216 #define INT_RETCNTR_ADDR    (INT_KEY_ADDR+INT_KEY_LEN)
00217 
00219 #define PIN_ADDR            (INT_RETCNTR_ADDR+1)
00221 #define PIN_RETCNTR_ADDR    (PIN_ADDR+PIN_LEN)
00223 #define PUK_ADDR            (PIN_RETCNTR_ADDR+1)
00225 #define PUK_RETCNTR_ADDR    (PUK_ADDR+PUK_LEN)
00226 
00228 #define DATA_END_1          (PUK_RETCNTR_ADDR+1)
00229 #endif /* CONF_WITH_FILESYSTEM!=1 */
00230 
00232 #define FS_START_PTR_ADDR   DATA_END_1
00233 
00234 #if defined(__AVR_AT90S8515__)
00236 #define ENDIAN_LITTLE
00238 #define EEPROM_SIZE         0x200
00240 #define RAM_SIZE            0x200
00242 #define CHIP                0x01
00244 #define ESIZ                0x03
00246 #define ARCH                avr2
00247 #elif defined(__AVR_AT90S8535__)
00249 #define ENDIAN_LITTLE
00251 #define EEPROM_SIZE         0x200
00253 #define RAM_SIZE            0x200
00255 #define CHIP                0x01
00257 #define ESIZ                0x03
00259 #define ARCH                avr2
00260 #elif defined(__AVR_AT90S2323__)
00262 #define ENDIAN_LITTLE
00264 #define EEPROM_SIZE         0x80
00266 #define RAM_SIZE            0x80
00268 #define CHIP                0x00
00270 #define ESIZ                0x03
00272 #define ARCH                avr2
00273 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega161__)
00275 #define ENDIAN_LITTLE
00277 #define EEPROM_SIZE         0x200
00279 #define RAM_SIZE            0x400
00281 #define CHIP                0x02
00283 #define ESIZ                0x03
00285 #define ARCH                avr5
00286 #elif defined(__i386__)
00288 #define ENDIAN_LITTLE
00290 #define EEPROM_SIZE         0x200
00292 #define RAM_SIZE            0x200
00294 #define CHIP                0xFF
00296 #define ESIZ                0xFF
00297 #else
00298 #error Unknown destination platform.
00299 #endif
00300 
00301 #endif /* SOSSE_CONFIG_H */
